turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order the Cherry Mocha from starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which specific starbucks store are you referring to.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on 34th street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which one are you referring to on 34th

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one between 5th and 6th ave.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. The one with address 350 34th st.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And you want the cherry mocha, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2% is ideal.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want whipped cream with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Of course, you can't have the cherry mocha without it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright, let me put in that order for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: that would be great. thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright, the order is put in. it should be under your name.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: awesome, when will it be ready.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they are making it now, it will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: i'm on my way there now to pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hope it tastes good.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes, I am looking forward to it. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome.
